name: WhateverAlex TZGX
description:
A game where you control a spaceship, and shoot aliens in space. I originally intended to make it into a rhythm game but my tools messed up, so I had to change it a bit, and thus, this game was made.

NOTE: If your antivirus software says that the executable performed a malicious action, please know that it is a false alarm. All the executable does is  run the game and work with its own files. A video may be temporarily placed on the folder, in order for it to run the intro. The INI file is just for saving the high score and keeping the game settings. All of the files which this executable has used does not contain any viruses, and the executable itself does not perform any malicious actions.

Controls

WASD - Move Spaceship
Arrow Keys - Move Shield
Spacebar - Shoot
Enter - Confirm
Escape - Exit Game/Skip Intro
F9 - Take Screenshot
F4 - Toggle Fullscreen (does not work during intro)

Credits

Created by Alexander James

Code by Alexander James

Music by Alexander James

Sound effects made with Bfxr

Graphics by Alexander James
